description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Being the largest recruitment website in Vietnam, VietnamWorks provide many huge events, workshops, seminars, job fair,….which coordinate employers and job seekers, help both of them develop network, find right people, right job at the right time.
              

              Currently, we are seeking for an Event Intern to support our Event & Activation team in executing various big events of VietnamWorks. If you have passion in organizing events and you want to learn as much as possible in this field, this is your chance!
              

              As an Event Intern, you will spend your ideal day by take part in:
              

              • Event Execution:
              
              -	Execute various types of events such as: VIP Employer Seminar, Job-seeker Workshop, and Activation.
              
              -	Attend planning meetings as needed.
              
              -	Analyze & Report Data before and after event.
              
              -	Contact vendors as needed to move event logistics forward.
              
              -	Organize & purchase supplies for event as needed.
              
              -	Help to establish logistics for the events as needed.
              

              • Marketing Administration:
              
              -	Assist in paperwork and legworks for events and other Marketing activities.Cooperate with design team to finalize creative ideas
              

              What you can receive in this internship:
              
              - Chance to learn every step in organizing events (planning, execution, budget management, …) in professional way from one of the most well-branded international company in Vietnam
              
              - Dynamic environment to practice and enhance a number of skills relating to project management; marketing communication, target marketing…
              
              - Working at opened and high team work spirit in Marketing team
              
              - Opportunity to network with professionals, HR experts in various industries
              
              - Valuable chance to attend all of VietnamWorks events with no charge
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Available to work full time in 4 months, overtime depends on event schedule
              
              • Proactive, Eager to learn and can-do attitude
              
              • Proven skills in Microsoft Office, Email, Internet
              
              • Fluent in English (verbal and written)
              
              • Good result in English Proficiency tests (IELTS, TOEFL, or SAT) is a plus
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
